metadata.title: Cyqle - The AI-Powered Collaborative Cloud Browser
metadata.description: Transform your workflow with the world's first collaborative cloud browser featuring intelligent AI automation.

hero.title: Smart Browser for Enhanced Collaboration
hero.description: Unlock seamless collaboration and automation in the cloud. Cyqle's AI-powered browser transforms how people work together.
hero.trialInfo: 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

aiAutomation.title: Smart AI Automation
aiAutomation.description: AI that learns from your workflow and automates repetitive tasks, saving you hours every day.

cloudNative.title: Cloud-Native Browser
cloudNative.description: Access your complete Browse environment from anywhere, with all tools and settings perfectly synced.

collaboration.title: Real-Time Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work together seamlessly in the same browser session, no matter where you are located.

testing.title: Advanced Testing Tools
testing.description: Run tests across multiple environments with one click and share results instantly.

support.title: Built-in Customer Support
support.description: Guide and assist customers directly within their browser session for faster resolution.

pipelines.title: Customizable Workflows
pipelines.description: Create and optimize workflows for any process with drag-and-drop simplicity.

development.title: Development
development.description: Collaborate in real-time on code, test features, and debug together seamlessly.

qa.title: QA & Testing
qa.description: Automate test scenarios, share results instantly, and reduce testing time by up to 70%.

customerSupport.title: Customer Support
customerSupport.description: See exactly what your customers see and guide them to solutions in real-time.

operations.title: Operations
operations.description: Build, optimize, and automate workflows with AI-powered insights.

aiSection.title: AI That Learns and Adapts to Your Work
aiSection.description: Cyqle's AI observes, learns, and automates your workflow, freeing you to focus on what matters most.
items: AI records and automates repetitive tasks
Smart suggestions based on your workflow patterns
Share and manage automation scripts across your organization
Seamless integration with your existing tools

items.quote: Cyqle has cut our customer resolution time by 40%. A game-changer for our support operations!
items.author: Sarah Johnson

items.quote: Our QA productivity has soared. Cyqle's automation has saved us hundreds of hours.
items.author: Michael Chen

items.quote: Cyqle has bridged the gap between our development and operations. Collaboration has never been better!
items.author: Alex Rodriguez

cta.title: Ready to Elevate Your Performance?
cta.description: Join thousands already using Cyqle to collaborate smarter, automate faster, and achieve more.
cta.trialInfo: 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

footer.description: The collaborative cloud browser with AI-powered automation for modern work.
